abstractText: Objective: Quantify change in elevation at waters surface between the top andbottom boundaries of the reach.Elevation Change Definition: vertical difference or drop between the water surface at the Top of the Reach (TR) and the water surface at the Bottom of the Reach (BR).Gradient Definition: the percent slope, at water surface, of the stream reach (elevationchange/reach length).
title: Measuring Change in Reach Elevation v2.0
